text: Ma ema nobed hekalu mopwodhi ni jodolo. Enobed kilomita apar gariyo gi nus kuom borne man yo nyandwat, lachne kilomita abich yo podho chiengʼ kendo lachne ma yo podho chiengʼ bende kilomita abich, bangʼe borne mochomo yo milambo nobed kilomita apar gariyo gi nus. E dier lowono tir e kama nogerie kama ler mar lemo mar Jehova Nyasaye.
